statements: SELECT student_id, course_id, module_id, module_completed, grade FROM StudentCourseProgress;
SELECT * FROM StudentCourseProgress WHERE student_id = 1;
SELECT course_id, module_id, module_completed FROM StudentCourseProgress WHERE grade >= 80;
SELECT * FROM StudentCourseProgress ORDER BY grade DESC;
SELECT course_id, COUNT(*) AS total_modules FROM StudentCourseProgress GROUP BY course_id;
SELECT student_id, course_id, module_id, module_completed, grade FROM StudentCourseProgress WHERE module_completed = true ORDER BY grade DESC, module_id ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT course_id, student_id, AVG(grade) AS average_grade FROM StudentCourseProgress GROUP BY course_id, student_id HAVING AVG(grade) > 80 ORDER BY average_grade DESC;

SELECT student_id, course_id, COUNT(DISTINCT module_id) AS completed_modules_count FROM StudentCourseProgress WHERE module_completed = true GROUP BY student_id, course_id HAVING completed_modules_count > 3;
SELECT course_id, AVG(grade) AS average_grade FROM StudentCourseProgress GROUP BY course_id ORDER BY AVG(grade) LIMIT 5;
SELECT course_id, COUNT(student_id) AS enrolled_students FROM StudentCourseProgress GROUP BY course_id ORDER BY enrolled_students DESC;
SELECT * FROM Students;
SELECT student_name, student_id FROM Students ORDER BY student_id DESC;
SELECT student_name FROM Students WHERE student_id = '123';
SELECT * FROM CourseProgress WHERE grade >= 80;
SELECT student_id, module_name FROM CourseProgress ORDER BY module_name ASC;
SELECT student_id, student_name FROM Students WHERE student_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT student_name, student_id FROM Students WHERE student_name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT * FROM Students WHERE student_name = 'John Doe';
SELECT student_id, student_name FROM Students ORDER BY student_name DESC;
SELECT student_name as Name, student_id as ID FROM Students WHERE student_name != 'Alice' GROUP BY student_name HAVING COUNT(*) > 1;
SELECT * FROM students;
SELECT student_name, student_id FROM students;
SELECT course_name FROM courses;
SELECT student_id, course_id, module_id FROM student_progress;
SELECT student_id, completed FROM student_progress;
SELECT * FROM students;
SELECT student_name, student_id FROM students ORDER BY student_id DESC;
SELECT course_name, course_id FROM courses WHERE course_id > 3;
SELECT student_id, course_id, module_id FROM student_progress WHERE completed = TRUE;

SELECT student_name, course_name, grade FROM students JOIN student_progress ON students.student_id = student_progress.student_id JOIN courses ON student_progress.course_id = courses.course_id ORDER BY student_name, grade DESC;
SELECT * FROM Students;
SELECT student_id, student_name FROM Students ORDER BY student_name ASC;
SELECT course_name, course_description FROM Courses WHERE course_id = 1;
SELECT student_name, grade FROM Students s JOIN Grades g ON s.student_id = g.student_id;
SELECT module_name, module_description FROM Modules WHERE course_id = 2 ORDER BY module_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM Students;
SELECT student_name, student_email FROM Students ORDER BY student_name ASC;
SELECT course_name, course_description FROM Courses WHERE course_id = 1;
SELECT student_name, module_name, grade FROM Students JOIN Grades ON Students.student_id = Grades.student_id JOIN Modules ON Grades.module_id = Modules.module_id;
SELECT course_name, module_name FROM Courses JOIN Modules ON Courses.course_id = Modules.course_id ORDER BY course_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM Students;
SELECT student_name, student_id FROM Students ORDER BY student_name DESC;
SELECT course_name, course_description FROM Courses WHERE course_id = 3;
SELECT student_name, Students.student_id, grade FROM Students JOIN Grades ON Students.student_id = Grades.student_id WHERE course_id = 2;
SELECT module_name, module_description, course_name FROM Modules JOIN Courses ON Modules.course_id = Courses.course_id ORDER BY module_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM Students;
SELECT student_name, student_id FROM Students WHERE student_id > 5 ORDER BY student_name DESC;
SELECT course_name, course_description FROM Courses WHERE course_name LIKE 'M%' AND course_name NOT LIKE '%d' ORDER BY course_name ASC;

SELECT student_name, module_name, grade FROM Students INNER JOIN StudentProgress ON Students.student_id = StudentProgress.student_id INNER JOIN Modules ON StudentProgress.module_id = Modules.module_id WHERE completed = TRUE ORDER BY student_name, module_name DESC;

SELECT student_name, course_name, grade FROM Students LEFT JOIN Grades ON Students.student_id = Grades.student_id LEFT JOIN Courses ON Grades.course_id = Courses.course_id ORDER BY student_name ASC, course_name DESC;
